section.title: Service catalog
section.para: The Service catalog provides information about all Rackspace Cloud services available to an end-user. The catalog is returned by the Rackspace Identity service API in response to a successful authentication request as shown in the examples in the Annotated authentication request and response documentation.

The following sections provide information about the service types supported by Rackspace Cloud APIs included in the service catalog and information about processing the service catalog returned by the Identity service.

Service and Identity administrators can use the Identity API to manage service configuration and the API capablities supported by a service. For details, see the following documentation:
Service operations
Service API operations
